bugs.title: CVE-2021-45450 mbedtls: policy bypass or oracle-based decryption [fedora-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2021-45450 mbedtls: policy bypass or oracle-based decryption [fedora-all]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2021-45450 mbedtls: policy bypass or oracle-based decryption

long_desc.thetext:
psa_cipher_generate_iv and psa_cipher_encrypt allow policy bypass or oracle-based decryption when the output buffer is at memory locations accessible to an untrusted application.

Reference:

https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbedtls/releases/tag/v3.1.0
https://github.com/ARMmbed/mbedtls/releases/tag/v2.28.0

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2021-45451 mbedtls: policy bypass/oracle-based decryption in psa_aead_generate_nonce

long_desc.thetext:
In Mbed TLS before 3.1.0, psa_aead_generate_nonce allows policy bypass or oracle-based decryption when the output buffer is at memory locations accessible to an untrusted application.

Reference:
